weekly_top_story.headline: Iran's Violent Crackdown on Protests Leaves Hundreds Dead as Trump Weighs Military Response and Imposes Tariffs
weekly_top_story.summary: Iranian authorities have killed at least 648 protesters amid widespread unrest, prompting U.S. President Trump to announce 25% tariffs on countries doing business with Iran and consider military strikes or cyberattacks, escalating global tensions and risking broader conflict.

stories.headline: Russia Launches Massive Drone and Missile Attack on Ukraine, Targeting Power Infrastructure
stories.summary: Russia fired nearly 300 drones, 18 ballistic missiles, and 7 cruise missiles at Ukraine's energy grid overnight, killing at least four and leaving thousands without heat amid winter, intensifying the humanitarian crisis in the ongoing war.

stories.headline: Intense Winter Storm Kills at Least Eight Palestinians in Gaza, Toppling Shelters
stories.summary: A severe storm has collapsed buildings and tents across Gaza, killing eight including a 15-year-old girl, exacerbating the humanitarian disaster and prompting renewed calls for Israel to allow more aid into the besieged area.
